title: Day 1208
content:
# Day 1208

Started the day early taking my Dad to the airport, then came back to tackle the lawn before recording a podcast. Squeezed in 9 holes of golf afterward, rushed home for a quick shower, and headed right back out for dinner with my Daughter and the Grandparents. Safe to say it's been non-stop and I'm ready to call it a night.

> **Psalm 118:24 (KJV)**
 _"This is the day which the Lord hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it."_

Today, like all days, was a gift from God.

7/12/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
